name: No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III
author: Cindy Carnes
summary: These cookies were always served for school lunch.  I got the recipe after marrying from one of the cooks, and have made it many times since.  This cookie generally is seen with cocoa, but I like this one better, it doesn't have any.
directions: In a saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar, butter and milk
Bring to a rapid boil and boil for one full minute
Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and peanut butter
Mix  in the oats, stirring until the mixture begins to cool
Transfer to a large bowl if it does not fit into the pan well
Drop batter by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper
